buffs.name: Tower Damage
buffs.description: Increases damage dealt to enemies by towers. - Britney Spears, 1965

buffs.name: Attack Damage
buffs.description: Increases damage dealt by player attacks. - Mohamed Ali, 2020

buffs.name: Speed Boost
buffs.description: Increases the player movement speed. - Sonic the Hedgehog, 1850

buffs.name: Rallying Call
buffs.description: Increases tower attack speed when player is nearby. - Generic Anime Protagonist, Yesterday

buffs.name: Cement Soup
buffs.description: Repairs all towers a small amount when an enemy is killed or player levels up. - Bob the Builder, 1992

buffs.name: Art of War
buffs.description: Player damage is proportional to number of towers in play. - Sun Tzu, 1971

buffs.name: Fastest Man Alive
buffs.description: Charges a special attack meter while moving. When fully charged, player gets a damage boost for a limited time. - Barry Allen, 200 B.C.

buffs.name: Thriller
buffs.description: Obtain a boost to movement speed while being chased by an enemy. - Michael Jackson, Tomorrow

buffs.name: Divide and Conquer
buffs.description: Obtain a boost to movement speed after building a tower. - Tolbjorn, 2030
